name: Automated Tests with Real Databases
description: Modern CI/CD pipeline solutions utilize containerization, this makes initializing a dedicated database within a pipeline to run tests against a very viable solution.

name: Peer review equals pull request
description: Does this really fulfill a regulatory requirement and are there better techniques that do not have the bottleneck effects of PR workflow?

name: Production data in test environments
description: The security risks along with the increasing privacy laws are making this techique untenable.  Consider that there are techiques that provide more value with less risk available now.
